title: SSD repair
message: I had a few macbooks repairs, a few of them they had the ssd faulty. Does anyone know if that can be fixed?

title: SSD repair
message: So far I have found no way, unless a simple resistor fixes it. Usually they are just dead.

title: SSD repair
message: I currently have a dead 512GB SSD here myself, I've been trying to diagnose it in my spare time but no results so far. Its probably just dead and unsaveable
